::Slayer::

Slayer nods, activating the cloaking device. It cloaked him from 
scanners and also mostly cloaked Ignatius, since the bot was holding 
on to him.

"Allright, back to base," he says, flying toward the Trainer base.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius looked around. "I don't have a cloaking device but I  know 
enough
> tricks that they won't follow us." The eagle bot watched in the 
distance the
> bat probes had become tiny little dots by now, he knew that at 
least for the
> moment they were safe.
